Bought the size large (size guide says 31.5). I’m size waist 30. Very comfortable and I like the style. Only thing I wish was better were the pockets. Pockets were kind of small for men’s pants. I’ve washed them once and I think the quality is good. Pretty good for the price. Would buy another pair in the future.
